entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
